Actions.Name: Rebound
Actions.Description: The Pole Fighter pushes off an adjacent character. They shove that character 1 space, then dash 1.

Actions.Name: High Flyer
Actions.Description: The Pole Fighter balances on their pole and uses it to move, ignoring all terrain penalties and engagement. While in this stance, any time they end a dash, they can shove an adjacent character 1 space, then deal fray damage to them.

Combos.Name: Dive Kick
Combos.Description: The Pole fighter dashes 1, ending this stance. An adjacent foe is stunned and must save or take 3[D]+[fray], or [D]+[fray] on a successful save.
